階乘.definition: the factorial of a number, e.g. 5! = 5.4.3.2.1 = 120

階梯.definition: flight of steps; (fig.) stepping stone; way to reach the goal of

階梯計價.definition: volumetric pricing; tiered pricing; differential pricing

階段.definition: stage; section; phase; period; CL:個|个[ge4]

階段性.definition: specific to a particular stage (of a project etc); interim (policy etc); occurring in stages; phased

階級成分.definition: social composition; social status (in Marxist theory, esp. using during the Cultural Revolution)
